item.title: n8n
item.author: subhashyadavtw@gmail.com (Subhash Yadav)
item.description: About n8n : n8n is an open-source workflow automation tool that lets you connect apps, APIs, and services using a visual interface, but more powerful and developer-friendly. TIP : Its Just an advanced version of jenkins or any automation pipeline. where these automation tool allows us to write scripts and integrate the workflow where n8n directly allows us to integrate applications and tools. What I can achieve with n8n : Automate repetitive tasks between services (e.
